name: Talk to Strangers
description: ----- Hello, and welcome to Sunny Morningsâ„¢! ----- Talk to Strangers is a game of everyday survival. Survive door to door conversations ranging from bizarre to mundane (in this order) while trying to sell products to strangers. But beware: nothing is what it seems in this neighborhood.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: Celeron 2.5ghz or equivalent Memory: 3 GB RAM Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 Support and 256 MB of RAM Storage: 300 MB available space Additional Notes: 1280x720 minimum resolution
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 64bits or later Processor: Core i3 2.5ghz or equivalent Memory: 3 GB RAM Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 Support and 256 MB of RAM Storage: 300 MB available space Additional Notes: 1280x720 minimum resolution
